title: How to write freelancing gigs as a beginner - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are new on fiverr then you may take some time to get work because you neither have any work experience here nor do you have any reviews of buyer, so you should use keywords in your gig. You should use a keyword that can search keyword buyer and it gets your link. Use the keyword at least 3 times in your gig. You fill your information correctly in your gig, for example: How many hours can you work? In how many days you can complete the work and give it ? What can you do in your service? Do not fill any information wrong.
